author: cnbc.com
title: Nasdaq Halts Longfin Corp.
text:
NEW YORK, April 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Nasdaq Stock Market ® (Nasdaq:NDAQ) announced that trading was halted today in Longfin Corp. (Nasdaq:LFIN) at 10:01:38 Eastern Time for "additional information requested" from the company at a last sale price of $28.189.
Trading will remain halted until Longfin Corp. has fully satisfied Nasdaq’s request for additional information.
For news and additional information about the company, please contact the company directly or check under the company’s symbol using InfoQuote: s SM on the Nasdaq ® Web site.
For more information about The Nasdaq Stock Market, visit the Nasdaq Web site at http://www.nasdaq.com .
NDAQO
Nasdaq Media Contact:
Christine Barna
